gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 124, Hawks 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Hawks, 124-97. Cameron Johnson recorded a season-high 29 points and seven 3PM for the Nets, with Dennis Schroder adding 23 points, eight rebounds, and seven assists in the victory. Dejounte Murray tallied 28 points, six rebounds, and five assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Nets improve to 23-36, while the Hawks fall to 26-33.
